text:
The test "if (listener != null)" in run method of SocketNode, is always false
because listener is not initialized in this class.

Consequently SocketHubReceiver, for example, is not triggered when SocketNode is
closed.
creator: rmarbeck@free.fr

text:
The test has since been modified, to check the listenerList, which may indeed 
be non-null (and non-empty).  So the test has merit and should be retained.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
